name: Sunrise Express!
text:
Can be used before your normal draw each time your Life Points decrease by 1000. One of the cards from your normal draw this turn will be a Level 10 EARTH Machine-Type monster in your Deck.
This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck (excluding Extra Deck) that has 3 or more Level 10 EARTH Machine-Type monsters.
